text: @chrislhayes @olivier_patti We Arizonans can thank @dougducey for our COVID19 spikes.  He opened up the state right after @realDonaldTrump visited and didn’t implement the proper protection procedures to keep us safe.  Thank goodness some of us are smart and are protecting ourselves.  #DeathCult
